sentence.Network_en: I was curled up on the floor in a corner sobbing hysterically.
sentence.Network_cn: 我蜷缩在地上的某个角落，失声痛哭。

sentence.Network_en: She says she hasn'tlaughed as hysterically since she was 13.
sentence.Network_cn: 她说自己从13岁起就再也没有像这样疯狂大笑过。
“伯纳德？”她歇斯底里地提高了嗓门。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 以h开头的英语英文单词 ... hysteric 亢奋的 hysterically 歇斯底里地 homespun 布>手织的.

entry.tran: 歇斯底里的;情绪狂暴失控的
entry.def: Someone who is hysterical is in a state of uncontrolled excitement, anger, or panic.

example.ex: Police and bodyguards had to protect him as the almost hysterical crowds struggled to approach him...
example.tran: 当情绪几近失控的人群拼命想接近他时，警察和保镖不得不保护他。

example.ex: He made headlines and received hysterical hate mail.
example.tran: 他成了新闻人物，收到了疯狂的攻击性邮件。

entry.tran: 癔病的;（通常指因惊吓而）情绪异常激动的
entry.def: Someone who is hysterical is in a state of violent and disturbed emotion that is usually a result of shock.

example.ex: I suffered bouts of really hysterical depression.
example.tran: 我曾患阵发的严重癔病性抑郁症。

entry.tran: （笑声）疯狂失控的，不可抑制的
entry.def: Hysterical laughter is loud and uncontrolled.

example.ex: I had to rush to the loo to avoid an attack of hysterical giggles.
example.tran: 我不得不冲向卫生间，以免遭到别人的疯狂嘲笑。

entry.def: If you describe something or someone as hysterical, you think that they are very funny and they make you laugh a lot.

example.ex: Paul Mazursky was Master of Ceremonies, and he was pretty hysterical.
example.tran: 保罗·马祖尔斯基担任司仪，他简直把人笑坏了。

sentences.sentence: "she screamed hysterically when she heard the news"

auth_sentence.content: His daughters had never to his knowledge wept hysterically.
auth_sentence.res_content: His daughters had never to his knowledge wept hysterically.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His daughters had never to his knowledge wept hysterically.

auth_sentence.content: Then he got up and fled from the kitchen, laughing hysterically.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then he got up and fled from the kitchen, laughing hysterically.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then he got up and fled from the kitchen, laughing hysterically.

sentences.cn: 孩子们歇斯底里地傻笑。
